title: [WORK] Ep. 32: How to Figure Out What You Really Want w/ Amanda Steinberg
description:
Ashley talks with financial expert and founder of The Daily Worth, Amanda Steinberg about how to determine who you really are compared to the “you” societal norms determine you should be. Throughout the episode, Amanda gives some tips on how to break out of our culture’s collective narrative, how to design life on your terms, and how to let go of perceived "truths". Ashley and Amanda will dive deep and tell you how to find the courage to start breaking through the life formula you’re following, how to question your happiness with your current plan, and how to set your goals. Through her various tips and stories, you’ll learn how to create the life that you want, even if it’s abnormal!

Amanda's Book: Worth It

Book Mentioned: Loving What Is by Byron Katie

Find Amanda on social media: @amandasteinberg
